thread.title: VOTE: PL Goals of the Week
thread.title_full: VOTE: PL Goals of the Week

title: VOTE: PL Goals of the Week
text:
Watch and vote for your favourite Premier League goal of the week Last Updated: 04/01/17 11:58pm Watch all the best goals from matchday 20 Sergio Aguero's brilliant finish against Burnley? Lucas Perez's stunning volley at Bournemouth? Watch these crackers from the Premier League and vote for your favourite... 
We have put together a compilation of all the best strikes from the new year's action in the Premier League, and you can watch all six in the video above. 
Wilfried Zaha scored a sensational volley for Crystal Palace, although it was not enough to help them avoid defeat at home to Swansea City on Tuesday night. 
Meanwhile, on the same night, Bournemouth's Charlie Daniels gave his side the lead against Arsenal after a brilliant run and a cool finish in a match that also saw Perez find the back of the net with a breathtaking volley. 
Elsewhere, on Monday Gael Clichy and Aguero were both on target with eye-catching strikes for Man City in their 2-1 win against Burnley, while Romelu Lukaku rounded off the scoring for Everton in their 3-0 win against Southampton with an excellent effort. 
Hit play on the video at the top of the page to watch the best Premier League goals Also See:
